operationId GetBalances

in query

required True

It is possible to enter list of up to 10 addresses as a comma separated string

required True
schema

description Wallet address
description The option to select only specific token types
It is possible to enter list of multiple types as a comma separated string
Use fungible ERC20 nft includes ERC721 and ERC1155 or multitoken ERC1155 only

schema
PageSize
type number
minimum 1
maximum 50
description The offset to obtain next page of the data
in query
name offset
schema
Offset
type number
summary Get balances of addresses
description 50 credits per API call
Get balances of fungible tokens ERC20 NFTs ERC721 and ERC1155 or multitokens ERC1155 only for a specific wallet address on the following blockchains

Celo  celo / celotestnet
Ethereum  ethereum / ethereumsepolia
BNB Binance Smart Chain  bsc / bsctestnet
Polygon  polygon / polygonmumbai
Tezos  tezosmainnet

To get started

Provide a chain name and commaseparated list of addresses Our API will return balances of each token along with further information such as its type id and more
Aside from relevant information about each token and its balance the response also contains metadata they can however be excluded by setting excludeMetadata to true
If not specified the API returns balances for all supported types of tokens fungible tokens nft multitokens but you can also choose to filter specific tokenTypes
For Tezos blockchain the API returns only balance of native token XTZ for specified wallet addresses Following query parameters wont have any effect on filtering data tokenTypes excludeMetadata pageSize and offset
